Union one or more polygons

Source: R/venndir-sp.R
union_polygons.Rd

Union one or more polygons

union_polygons(sp, ...)

Arguments

sp

list object that contains one or more sp::SpatialPolygons.
...

additional arguments are ignored.

Value

object sp::SpatialPolygons

Details

This function takes a list of sp::SpatialPolygons objects, and performs iterative rgeos::gUnion() on the full list, since rgeos::gUnion() only operates on two polygons at a time.

See also

Other venndir utility: curate_venn_labels(), eulerr2polys(), find_vennpoly_overlaps(), get_largest_polygon(), get_venn_shapes(), intersect_polygons(), label_polygon_fill(), make_color_contrast(), make_venn_combn_df(), make_venn_test(), match_list(), nudge_sp(), print_color_df(), rescale_coordinates(), rescale_ps(), rescale_p(), rescale_sp(), shrink_df(), sp_circles(), sp_ellipses()
